customerReviewBodies: I normally am not a review writer, but felt like these deserved one. I was honestly expecting cheap breakable plastic, but these are surprisingly thick and durable. It‚Äôs very cute and perfect to keep the characters from getting lost when they‚Äôre not in use. Our package didn‚Äôt include the brown character, but we got two of the teal characters (so still 12 total). But our kids don‚Äôt mind so it wasn‚Äôt a huge deal. Overall very impressed and highly recommended.

Keep in mind these are made of some sort of hard plastic, but they‚Äôre super thick so their very sturdy! My 7 year and 9 year old loves these!!

I‚Äôll admit I didn‚Äôt read any reviews, I didn‚Äôt read about their size, and I don‚Äôt think I even looked at the rating - I just bought them. My two boys play pretend Among Us all the time so I thought ‚Äòlet‚Äôs get some figurines.‚Äô To my happy surprise it came with a bag to keep the toys in, their innards, hats, and bodies are interchangeable (which is a total plus), and it came with stickers. What kid doesn‚Äôt love stickers?! Another bonus, they aren‚Äôt itty bitty and they‚Äôre made of durable thick plastic/rubber substance, which means they won‚Äôt crack down the sides like an Easter egg or bend in half like a McDonald‚Äôs toy. ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

A little long, but bear with me. So, since my child has been in elementary school I've given gift bags to the class and/or for the birthday party (usually very small and just close friends, so in no way birthdayzilla). So, this year I chose Among us, since during lockdown that became a favorite. But as with any parent who they thinks they know what their kid likes, only to find out that was so last week, I was worried because now Friday Night Funkin has been the flavor of the month, with next to no gift opportunities for parties, birthdays, or basically anything (and believe me I tried!). However, with a pandemic still bumbling along, I arranged with my youngster to have a party somewhere outdoors when it gets warmer...or so I thought. Young one informed me that they told all their friends about the party on Saturday (this was Wednesday) so I started scrambling. Well, it turned out the mouse house their heart was set on would enforce a full vaccination mandate for 5-11 on the day the party would happen. Try as I might, no vaccines before then, so I had to inform my beloved that the party would have to wait. Much disappointment! And I get it. My child really doesn't ask for much and weathered isolation as an only like a, very lonely, trooper. So, I really wanted to do something special at home to make up for it. So, the family decided on a video game treasure hunt for presents, with an Among us theme (since no FNF). So I searched frantically for decorations, and since we don't like balloons and stuff, choices were limited. I opted for a table cloth, a huge sign, and these figures of Among us characters around the table in all forms of Among us chaos (if you've played the game you know what I mean). Well, I was worried about timing, but they came when they said they would. They are about 2.5 inches tall, well made and open up to a little bone for when they are eliminated. I had fun decorating with that, lol. One was reading a book (a present), a few were in conversations, a couple eliminated...It looked great! I ended up not needing 24, but no worries because they became party favors for when the birthday party actually happened. They are good quality, larger than expected and didn't smell bad (you know what I mean). So these are great! Like really saved a hohum idea and made it more special.
Now, just a few notes. They all come separately wrapped in plastic little baggies, which might be a deal breaker for you. Also, the 24 pieces were 2 x the 12, which was not an issue for us but may be for you. Finally, if you want the figurines, make sure that's what you order and not the candles. Ours came with a small backpack that I store them in. All on all, my tween played with them and thought they were really cool, so if your child is younger it would be an even bigger hit. I definitely recommend them if you have an Among us fan in the house (and even the adults were impressed, so I actually mean it). I don't write reviews often, but these figurines were worth my time. Hope this helps!

I bought these for my Among Us obsessed child. He absolutely loves them! They seem well-made and they are a good size, not teeny-tiny & fit nicely in your hand. The pieces are all sturdy and it doesn't seem like anything will break. The hats and 'guts' are all interchangeable. Overall I am pleased with the quality and value. My kid has been playing with these toys instead of the video game all afternoon so I am very happy with my purchase!

I just opened these- I set them aside for Christmas and hid them. These are AMAZING and my son is going to LOVE THEM. These are pretty big, and they cut if half just like in the game with the bone sticking out. Lots of colors and weird accessories. They came with a bag instead of in a box, so some creativity will be required from the North Pole, but everything was packed nicely, and the bag was a bonus. There was also stickers included. Absolutely wonderful : )

Update- my son LOVED this for Christmas and played with it for hours. He even shared with his toddler sister. I got a little box for them and he went nuts when he opened it because he had never seen them in a store : )

My kiddo is obsessed with Sonic the Hedgehog and Among Us and mixing the two together was a hit for him. He absolutely loved this Tails Among Us plush.

Some things about the plush, it is very soft, and cuddly. These are musts for any stuffed animal or plushie, which means it checks these boxes. The craftsmanship and sewing looks durable, and from what I can see (as someone who sews) that this isn't going to be falling apart after a lot of use and even some washing- though always use a gentle cycle if handwashing isn't an option.

One of the reasons this wasn't a five star for me was mostly due to packaging. It was in a vacuum sealed bag, meaning that had this been a gift I would have needed to open it with enough time for it to fluff up; and even then it's not without wrinkles. The tails are still slightly flattened - even two days after opening the package. Tails' ears are flimsy compared to the rest of the body and almost like a different material was used when making them.

Overall, this plush was a hit in my house and I am sure it would be a hit in yours! Even with the wrinkles and the feeling of a different material used on the ears it is still a very much loved item. I would absolutely recommend it.
